body.name: GOTHAM STEEL 10 Inch Non Stick Frying Pans, 100% PFOA Free Healthy and Non Toxic Ceramic Pan for Cooking, Oven Safe, Dishwasher Safe
body.merchantInfo: Sold by REAL CO USA and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 31 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: GOTHAM STEEL NATURAL COLLECTION: Healthier cooking is easy with this nonstick ceramic 10” fry pan. It's designed to be 2x more durable, dishwasher safe, and oven safe up to 500˚F. Stay-cool handles allow you to go from stovetop to oven. But this fry pan doesn’t just cook good, it looks good too, with a modern cream color that adds an elevated aesthetic to your kitchen.
10 INCH FRYING PAN: Nonstick ceramic coating with even heat distribution to cook eggs, sear scallops, stir fry veggies, and more!

ULTRA NONSTICK CERAMIC SURFACE: Healthy cooking is just a step away. Thanks to a nonstick surface that’s 2x more durable than previous generations, minimal to no oil or butter is needed. And it’s designed to properly conduct heat so food cooks evenly.
NON-TOXIC COATING: Made without PFOA, PFOS, PFAS, PFTE, lead, or cadmium, so it’s safer for you and your family.

EASY TO CLEAN: No more stuck-on bits! Food slides right off when used on low and medium heat as directed. Wipe off with minimal scrubbing. The ceramic coating is stain resistant (and scratch resistant) so no need to worry about tomato sauce, beets, or any other food. Plus this fry pan is designed to be dishwasher safe.
DISHWASHER SAFE: Spend less time on cleanup during busy weeknights. Once you’re done cooking, just place your cookware into the dishwasher for a hassle-free cleaning experience.

EASY TO HANDLE: Easy to lift and move around, from stovetop to oven to table, yet sturdy enough to handle all your cooking needs. Ergonomic handles stay cool to the touch to offer maximum comfort while cooking.
OVEN SAFE TO 500˚F: Go from stovetop to table with ease. Fry pan is compatible with induction, gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen stovetops.

GREAT GIFT: Give a practical and thoughtful present: college grads, a wedding shower, newlywed registry, housewarming for new renters and homeowners, or someone who really enjoys cooking with well-made cookware. Or stock a vacation rental with picture-worthy cookware.
10-YEAR PROMISE: Guaranteed to last for up to 10 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We’ve had this pan now for 2 1/2 months. It gets used just about everyday. Cooks everything evenly has no scratches but we r careful about what we use for utensils. This pan washes up so nice it’s hard to believe! We fried pork chops and just wiped it out clean with a paper towel. I would buy again for sure. The only thing is I wish the bottom was just a little bit bigger it would b nice to have just a smig more room. Otherwise it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely easy to clean & attractive
reviews.reviewText: Great even heating and handled gooey foods without Sticking. Attractive enough to take to the table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Most Preferable Pan In The Kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: I’m talking pancakes, diced potatoes, eggs, meats, things that would just get STUCK at the bottom of my other pans slide right off of this nice piece! Please note, a little butter or oil is recommended to make this seamless! (Even when I use oil and butter in my other pans, things would still stick, ESPECIALLY with potatoes, but not for this pan)Fair warning for eggs, they would sometimes drift to the edges of the pan after you’d crack them in. Makes it easy to flip from the pan for me so I don’t mind it. This product makes me a fan of the Gotham Steel Pans! Reliable, easy to wash and DISHWASHER SAFE! Wishing for one of their 12” pans for Christmas!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not like the commercials but good pans
reviews.reviewText: steaks do stick to the pan when cooking but not hard. the stuck-on parts do clean off easily. would buy again as they work well and are semi nonstick but not like the commercials. I use these daily and other than a little discoloration on the bottom work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO FAR SO GOOD
reviews.reviewText: YOU DON'T KNOW ENOUGH IN A COUPLE WEEKS TO KNOW HOW THE PAN WILL WORK IN THE END. HOWEVER, SO FAR WE ARE PLEASED. NO STICKING. EASY CLEAN UP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best non stick pans
reviews.reviewText: These truly work at non stick jist be careful when using butter since it's non stick the butter turns brown fast but really slides off the pan as advertised

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Turns brown from burning. No good!!
reviews.reviewText: This oan turned brown from the first use. Everything gets stuck to it. It's no good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice price . Not so good pan
reviews.reviewText: I like pots that are easy to clean but this pot isn’t . The outside of the pan I tried so many things & nothing helps . The inside which is white I use the scrub mommy & commercial soft scrub & it does a very nice job . So if the above is ok with you then buy it .
I already had 3 other frying pans from Gotham Steel and like them enough to buy a square 11'' x 11'' pan.Just love them all!!
Mantiene su anti adherencia después de varios meses de uso, seguiré evaluándolo
I've been looking for something square to make sandwich sized potions.
